Ancient Amethyst Dragon.explanation: A gargantuan ancient dragon with psionic and mind-manipulating abilities, similar in concept to an ancient dragon with added psychic powers.

Ancient Gold Dragon.explanation: Shares the ancient dragon type and majestic presence, though the Amethyst variant has unique psionic abilities.

Ancient Silver Dragon.explanation: Both are ancient dragons with a regal and majestic demeanor, differing mainly in elemental and psionic traits.
